description: Surrogate primary key for this status change log record. Uniquely identifies the row.
Date and time the event was logged in the system.
Application user account that performed the change or generated the log entry.
Identifier of the affected contact (likely a driver or employee record in the fleet system); confirm with SME.
Lookup key to the snapshot/static dimension representing the contact at event time; used for historical consistency; confirm with SME.
Human-readable label for the snapshot contact (e.g., name) stored to preserve history at the time of the event; confirm with SME.
Code for the updated status assigned to the contact after the change (e.g., available, out of service); confirm with SME.
Lookup key to the snapshot/static status at event time, ensuring historical reporting; confirm with SME.
Human-readable description of the new status captured at event time; confirm with SME.
Code for the previous status before the change; used to track transitions; confirm with SME.
Lookup key to the snapshot/static status representing the previous state at event time; confirm with SME.
Human-readable description of the previous status captured at event time; confirm with SME.
System timestamp when this log record was last updated.
Timestamp recorded as the user-context time of last modification to this record; often mirrors the system timestamp; confirm behavior with SME.
